thread.section_title: Hotel du Parc - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Little Local Place - Will Return!
thread.title_full: Perfect Little Local Place - Will Return! - Review of Hotel du Parc, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Elizabeth B
title: Perfect Little Local Place - Will Return!
text: Great location right next to the metro, great rooms (my family had 2 to accommodate our large group), superb private bathrooms, optional add-on breakfast that offers everything you could ever want, and wonderful help at front desk. Needed a cab on last day to return to airport and the hotel arranged a very nice cab for us. The luggage hold proved very helpful for our arrival day. Free computer access in lobby was also helpful. Will stay here again!
